message: I propose a fair split. I take 90%, and you get 10%.  This is a good starting point for us to work from.
Alice, your offer was quite bold! Let's be realistic. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  Think carefully, the value decreases rapidly with each round!
Bob, let's be reasonable. My offer is 60/40 in my favor.  This is a fair compromise considering the value decrease.
